H0.text: Evaporation of water is the change that Louis found involves a chemical change in matter.

H1.text: Grinding of rock is a change that Louis found involving a chemical change in matter, as he was investigating physical and chemical changes in matter.

H2.text: Melting of ice is the change that Louis found that involves a chemical change in matter.

H3.text: Rusting of iron was the chemical change in matter that Louis investigated while studying physical and chemical changes.

A4.text: The rusting of iron is an electrochemical process that begins with the transfer of electrons from iron to oxygen.

A5.text: The main catalyst for the rusting process is water.
